text:
Pubfront | Android Developer | Copenhagen, Denmark | On-site | Full-time

Pubfront is an established (2010) startup building a platform for publishing, selling and reading/listening to ebooks, audiobooks and comics. We’re currently looking for an experienced Android developer to join our Copenhagen team and maintain, improve and eventually take full control of our mobile apps.

Interested? Check out the full ad at http://pubfront.com/job-opening-android-developer/ and send your resumé to jk@pubfront.com
